page.title: 02CLUBS COMMUNICATIONS ECOLOGY
page.content:
A FEW CLUBS FLOURISH HERE. THE BOWLING CLUB HAS A LARGE MEMBERSHIP, AS HAS THE CURLING CLUB WHICH IS BASED IN STRANRAER SOME 25KM NORTH. OTHER CLUBS INCLUDE DARTS, YOUNG WIVES, RURAL (WRI),ALL NORMAL FOR A COUNTRY AREA.
{COMMUNICATIONS} PRACTICALLY EVERY HOUSE HAS A TELEPHONE AND THE AREA HAS ONE POSTAL DELIVERY PER DAY.
{ECOLOGY} THE AREA HAS FEW TREES DUE TO THE SALTY WIND.THOSE WHICH DO SURVIVE ARE MAINLY SYCAMORES AND CONIFERS. THE CLIMATE IS WET BUT MILD DUE TO THE PROXIMITY OF THE GULF STREAM.POLLUTION IS A PROBLEM, TIDAL CURRENTS BRINGING RADIOACTIVE MATERIAL INTO LUCE BAY FROM THE IRISH SEA.
